name: Chang the Ninth
title: Chang the Ninth, Listless Literati
desc: "He who has not known poverty has yet to become a true man, and at least this man has books to keep him company!"

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After either side uses a Skill: If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Physical DMG or <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG was dealt, or an <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Inspiration.When this card gains 3 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Inspiration, then discard this card and draw 2 cards.
